sense.def:
To carry something
pomeni nekaj vzeti s seboj in držati tako, da se ne dotika tal.

seg.quote: He picked up his suitcase and carried it into the bedroom.

sense.def:
To carry something
pomeni tudi imeti nekaj s seboj, kamorkoli gremo.

Kadar nekaj
carries a person or thing somewhere
, nekega človeka ali stvar nese na neki kraj.

seg.quote: A gentle current carried him slowly to the shore.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
carries a disease
, je okužen z neko boleznijo in jo lahko prenese na ljudi ali živali.

Če neko dejanje
carries a particular quality or consequence
, vsebuje določeno lastnost ali ima določeno posledico.

seg.quote: Any job carries with it periods of boredom.

sense.def:
Če človek
carries an idea or a method to a particular extent
, neko zamisel ali metodo uporablja ali razvije do določene meje.

seg.quote: George carried this idea one step further.

sense.def:
Če časopis ali plakat
carries a picture or an article
, vsebuje neko sliko ali članek.

seg.quote: A poster carried a portrait of Churchill.

sense.def:
Če je predlog ali pobuda v neki razpravi
carried
, večina glasuje zanj.

seg.quote: The motion was carried by 259 votes to 162.

sense.def:
Kadar zvok
carries
, ga lahko slišimo zelo daleč.

seg.quote: ...a faint voice which carried no farther than the front row.

sense.def:
To be carrying a child
pomeni, da je ženska noseča.

To carry on doing something
pomeni nekaj delati še naprej.

seg.quote: I carried on without their support.

sense.def:
To carry on an activity
pomeni sodelovati pri neki dejavnosti.

seg.quote: Our work is carried on in an informal atmosphere.

sense.def:
To carry out a task or order
pomeni opraviti nalogo ali izpolniti ukaz.

seg.quote: They also have to carry out many administrative duties.
He was simply carrying out the instructions he had received.

sense.def:
To carry something over
pomeni poskrbeti, da nekaj iz prvotnih okoliščin preide tudi v nove.

seg.quote: The habit of obedience is carried over from the war.

sense.def:
To carry a plan through
pomeni uresničiti določen načrt.

seg.quote: ...the task of carrying through the necessary reforms.
